data.name: MAELSTRÖM LEGACY: The Tesla Mystery
data.detailed_description:
Maelström Legacy: The Tesla Mystery is a game from the Point & Click / Puzzle genre, which will be available on PC and Mac. You lead the investigation in an anachronistic Paris where Nikola Tesla, the President of the High Scientific Council and organizer of the Scientific Congress, has disappeared! In an Art Nouveau / Steampunk atmosphere, you will discover colorful characters and many obstacles to your investigation...

Hayao Maelström is a young Japanese scientist and inventor who arrived in France two years ago. He moved to a small village, Valfutaie, in Haute-Savoie. One day, he receives an official letter, signed by Nikola Tesla. He is invited to the Congress of Scientists, an event that takes place every 10 years at the Palais des Congrès in Paris.

However, when Nikola Tesla finishes his opening speech, the lights go out. Once restored, we realize that Tesla has disappeared!

While the police are investigating to try to find the eminent scientist, Hayao, accompanied by his dog Alpina, are also doing their own investigations to discover the mystery surrounding this case...

Thus, you will play as Hayao and Alpina, and meet a whole range of characters as attractive as endearing, but you will probably also make enemies! You will wander through the streets of Paris according to the progress of your investigation, and will discover a totally revisited city, between steampunk and Art Nouveau, where steam and electricity are the engine of the country!
